LanguageData.NeedGenBioHopperDesc:
You have a BioGenerator with no hopper next to it.

To work, the BioGenerator must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with BioMatter.

Build a BioGenerator Hopper adjacent to the BioGenerator.
LanguageData.NeedFuelFeederDesc:
You have a Fuel Power Plant with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Fuel Power Plant must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Fuel.

Build a Fuel Power Plant Hopper adjacent to the Fuel Power Plant.
LanguageData.NeedGenHopperDesc:
You have a Steam Generator with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Steam Generator must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Kindling or Ethanol Fuel.

Build a Steam Generator Hopper adjacent to the Steam Generator.
LanguageData.NeedPlasmaGenFeederDesc:
You have a Plasma Reactor with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Plasma Reactor must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Bauxite Ore.

Build a Plasma Reactor Hopper adjacent to the Plasma Reactor.
LanguageData.NeedNuclearFeederDesc:
You have a Nuclear Power Plant or Military Nuclear Plant with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Nuclear Power Plant/Military Nuclear Plant must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Enriched Uranium.

Build a Nuclear Plant Hopper adjacent to the Nuclear Power Plant/Military Nuclear Plant.
LanguageData.NeedCentrifugeFeederDesc:
You have a Gas Centrifuge with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Gas Centrifuge must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Uranium Ore.

Build a Gas Centrifuge Hopper adjacent to the Gas Centrifuge.
LanguageData.NeedElectronicFeederDesc:
You have an Electronic Plant with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Electronic Plant must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Electronic Components.

Build an Electronic Plant Hopper adjacent to the Electronic Plant.
LanguageData.NeedCoalFeederDesc:
You have a Coal Power Plant with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Coal Power Plant must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Coal Ore, Charcoal or Peat.

Build a Coal Power Plant Hopper adjacent to the a Coal Power Plant.
LanguageData.AnotherGH: 离另一个地热加热器太近了。
LanguageData.AnotherPG: 离另一个等离子发电机太近了。
LanguageData.NoPlasmaGeothermalPlant: 附近没有等离子发生器。
LanguageData.AnotherME: 距离另一个采矿器太近。
LanguageData.AnotherPGR: 离另一个等离子体反应堆太近了。
LanguageData.AnotherFG: 离另一个钻井平台太近了。
LanguageData.AnotherGG: 离另一个地热发电机太近了。
LanguageData.OnMudOrWaterReportString: 这里无法收集。请找到水边或者泥地地形。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectSandDesc: 用于收集沙子。这项工作是一项低优先级的“开采”工作。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectSandReportString: 这里无法收集。请在沙地地形收集沙子。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectPeatDesc: 用于收集泥炭。这项工作是一项低优先级的“开采”工作。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectPeatReportString: 这里无法收集。请在沼泽地形收集。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectCrushedstoneDesc: 用于收集碎石。这项工作是一项低优先级的“开采”工作。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectCrushedstoneReportStrin: 这里无法收集。请在砂砾地形收集。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectSoftClayDesc: 在泥地或者浅水地形收集软黏土。这项工作是一项低优先级的“开采”工作。
LanguageData.DesignatorCollectSoftClayReportString: 这里无法收集。请在泥地或者浅水地形收集。
LanguageData.NeedOilFeederDesc:
You have an Oil Refinery with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Oil Refinery must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Crude Oil.

Build an Oil Refinery Hopper adjacent to the Oil Refinery.
LanguageData.NeedHeaterHopperDesc:
You have a Coal Burner with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Coal Burner must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Coal Ore, Charcoal or Peat.

Build a Coal Burner Hopper adjacent to the Coal Burner.
LanguageData.NearWithAnotherFissure: 太靠近另一个裂缝或挖矿机。
LanguageData.NeedAntimatterReactorFeeder: 需要反物质反应堆料斗
LanguageData.NeedAntimatterReactorFeederDesc:
You have an Antimatter Reactor with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Antimatter Reactor must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Antimatter.

Build an Antimatter Reactor Hopper adjacent to the the Antimatter Reactor.
LanguageData.NeedHadronColliderFeederDesc:
You have a Hadron Collider with no hopper next to it.

To work, the Hadron Collider must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with Inorganic Matter.

Build a Hadron Collider Hopper adjacent to the Hadron Collider.
LanguageData.ExhaustedMine: 你的一个采矿机耗尽了。你可以拆除它并造一个新的。
LanguageData.ExhaustedFissure: 你的一个原油裂隙耗尽了。拆除原油提取器，再钻一个新的原油裂隙。
LanguageData.BlastDoorJammed: The Blast Door has jammed from taking damage.\nRepair it now in order to close it immediately.
LanguageData.JammedRepaired: The Jammed Blast Door has been repaired and is now closed.
LanguageData.JammedBudgedClosed: The Jammed Blast Door budged and is now closed.
LanguageData.JammedBudgedWontClose: The Jammed Blast Door budged but it won't close.
LanguageData.DesignatorPlantsHarvestEdiblesDesc: 标记人类可以食用的植物，收获食物或者用于生产。
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestableFruits: 必须指定完全成长的可食用植物。
LanguageData.ChopWoodDesc: 标记并砍伐完全成长的树木。
LanguageData.CampfireNoDrafted: 柴堆附近没有足够开展营火聚会的殖民者！邀请更多的人来吧！
LanguageData.FeastNoDrafted: 桌子附近没有足够开展宴会的殖民者！邀请更多的人来吧！
LanguageData.MineBrushDesc: Finally a brush for mining. Use q and e to change size.
LanguageData.StripMinerDesc: Drag an area to strip mine. Use 8,4,5,6 on your !NUMBLOCK! to change spacing between strips.
LanguageData.VeinMinerDesc: Click on a visible ore and you will mine the whole vein.
LanguageData.VeinMinerReport: Must designate mineable and accessable ore!
LanguageData.FillFissureReq: 你确定要回填这个裂隙？
LanguageData.WildAnimalHuntingDesc: 一只野兽正在攻击你的殖民者或者牲畜！
